extension.name: plg_system_fatal_catcher
extension.author: RuposTel s.r.o.
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: Fatal Catcher - This plugin will send you an email if a blank page or a php fatal error occurs on your site. This is very usefull to diagnose sites which do not have access to error reporting. IMPORTANT: This plugin can break some session related functions if your site loads too many ajax calls. It is not recommended to run on a production site for a long term.

field.name: email
field.label: Send email to this addresses:
field.description: Set email address to which to send the notification email. If left empty, the Joomla global email will be used. Separate multiple email addresses by a comma.

field.name: errortype
field.label: Send all notices, warnings and errors
field.description: This option will send all generated notices, errors and warnings generated by your site. This can send hundres of emails per minute, be careful how you use this option. This is intended only for debuging purposes, do not leave this enabled.

field.name: writelog
field.label: Write to log file
field.description: When enabled this will write the error also to your log file in /logs/php_errors.log.php
